title: Wes Streeting – 2022 Comments on A&E Waiting Times
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Wes Streeting, the Shadow Secretary of State for Health and Social Care, on 11 January 2022.
content:
It’s unacceptable for almost half of patients to be left waiting, often in pain and distress, for more than four hours in A&E over Christmas.
